languages.text: "Быть может. Быть может, мон-кай чувствуют приближение неизбежного конца и готовы сдаться. Что ж... значит, час расплаты ближе, чем я узрел в переплетениях судьбы".

traits.locale_text: "Быть может. Быть может, мон-кай чувствуют приближение неизбежного конца и готовы сдаться. Что ж... значит, час расплаты ближе, чем я узрел в переплетениях судьбы".

languages.text: "Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."
languages.original_text: "Быть может. Быть может, мон-кай чувствуют приближение неизбежного конца и готовы сдаться. Что ж... значит, час расплаты ближе, чем я узрел в переплетениях судьбы".

traits.locale_text: "Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."
"Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."
"Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."
"Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."

languages.text: “或许吧，或许猴子已经感觉到他们即将到来、不可避免的结局，准备投降了。好吧……如果是这样的话，那么报应的时刻即将到来，比我在命运之网中所看到的景象还要更近。”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."

traits.locale_text: “或许吧，或许猴子已经感觉到他们即将到来、不可避免的结局，准备投降了。好吧……如果是这样的话，那么报应的时刻即将到来，比我在命运之网中所看到的景象还要更近。”

languages.text: 「もしや。ひょっとすると、モン＝ケイは己の終わりを避けられないと感じとり、降伏の準備をしているのか。ふむ…ならば、報いが訪れる時は、運命の織物で見たものより早いやもしれぬ」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."

traits.locale_text: 「もしや。ひょっとすると、モン＝ケイは己の終わりを避けられないと感じとり、降伏の準備をしているのか。ふむ…ならば、報いが訪れる時は、運命の織物で見たものより早いやもしれぬ」

languages.text: "Vielleicht. Vielleicht spüren die Chem-Pan-Sey ihr unvermeidliches Ende nahen und sind bereit zur Kapitulation. Nun ... in dem Fall ist die Stunde der Vergeltung näher, als ich im Gewebe des Schicksals erspäht habe."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht. Vielleicht spüren die Chem-Pan-Sey ihr unvermeidliches Ende nahen und sind bereit zur Kapitulation. Nun ... in dem Fall ist die Stunde der Vergeltung näher, als ich im Gewebe des Schicksals erspäht habe."

languages.text: « J'imagine qu'il est possible que les mon-keigh soient prêts à se rendre parce qu'ils sentent arriver leur fin inévitable. Eh bien... si c'est le cas, l'heure du châtiment est plus proche que j'avais cru le discerner dans la toile du destin. »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine qu'il est possible que les mon-keigh soient prêts à se rendre parce qu'ils sentent arriver leur fin inévitable. Eh bien... si c'est le cas, l'heure du châtiment est plus proche que j'avais cru le discerner dans la toile du destin. »

languages.text: «Tal vez. Tal vez los mon-keigh perciban la inmediatez de su sino inevitable y hayan decidido rendirse. Muy bien... de ser así, la hora de la retribución está más próxima de lo que vaticinaban los hilos del destino».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez. Tal vez los mon-keigh perciban la inmediatez de su sino inevitable y hayan decidido rendirse. Muy bien... de ser así, la hora de la retribución está más próxima de lo que vaticinaban los hilos del destino».

languages.text: "Belki. Belki de mon-keighler, kaçınılmaz sonlarının yaklaştığını sezmiştir, bu yüzden teslim olmaya hazırdır. Pekâlâ... Bu durumda intikam günü, kaderin örgüsünden çıkardığımdan daha yakın demektir."
languages.original_text: "Perhaps. Perhaps the mon-keigh sense their impending inevitable end and are ready to surrender. Well... if so, the hour of retribution is closer than I gleaned in the weavings of fate."

traits.locale_text: "Belki. Belki de mon-keighler, kaçınılmaz sonlarının yaklaştığını sezmiştir, bu yüzden teslim olmaya hazırdır. Pekâlâ... Bu durumda intikam günü, kaderin örgüsünden çıkardığımdan daha yakın demektir."
